Description: Lower body sherd (mended from two fragments) of large Mature Animal Style Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black; trace of single added white band at top of sherd, two at centre and two more at bottom of sherd; exterior, slip partly worn; three brown bands.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0434) (phase 2)
